column1: * 1944 – J.R.R. Tolkien sends Leaf by Niggle to the wikipedia:Dublin Review (Catholic periodical)
column2: which hosts a short-story competition. It was published in the January 1945 issue.

column1: * 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Kenneth I. Rasmussen
* 1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Rayner Unwin (12 October 1972).
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "The Last Stage" is aired on the BBC.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony in wikipedia:Milwaukee
** Tuor meets Voronwë who agrees to show Tuor the way to Gondolin. The pair set out on their journey.
